title: Jax jungle is one of the most opressive junglers in the game rn while Jax top is only mediocre
body: Am I the only one who thinks this is a problem? I understand that offroles are cool and all, but Jax jungle right now is completely fucking busted and has been since season start. I'm tired of seeing this piece of shit jump on my carry and two shot them with titanic triforce and not even take a quarter of their health in damage with counter strike and streaks abuse. This is out of control.

replies.body: If you wanna talk stat wise, they're performing pretty much equally. Jax top is about 1% higher win rate, and Jax jungle is about 1% higher pick rate.

"two shot"

that is hyperbole, unless Jax is glass cannon in which case you blow him up in less than 0.01 seconds.

"offroles"

What? Jax has always been able to jungle.

If you want my advice (I was diamond and I played jax jungle), just pick Kha'Zix into Jax Jungle, Kha'Zix counters Jax. You could also pick a tank like Sej and just have better team fighting. Split pushing is pretty dead.
